title: Flex Que ruined Diamond 5+ morning ques for Solo/Duo Q players (matchmaking problem)
body:
Now that Flex Que was introduced there are barely any D5 players on during morning times so the health of Solo/Duo Q is very bad.
Im being put with Silver/Gold players vsing a full team of high plats every game, low elo players refusing to co-operate as a team and somehow the match making thinks its fair that 1 Diamond player can carry a team of low plat/gold/silver player against a D5/high plat team 

This occurs to challengers as well 

I suggest removing flex que or closing Solo/Duo Rank que until afternoon time

EDIT: Not to mention que times are already 40-60 minutes minimum around morning time so you wait 1 hour for a very unfair game, its not appealing at all.

replies.body:
> [{quoted}](name=DOPA90888,realm=OCE,application-id=FjGAIbRv,discussion-id=BszKicJZ,comment-id=,timestamp=2016-11-26T01:29:45.844+0000)
>
> 
> I suggest removing flex que

Would be the simplest, yes. Do that and bring back ranked teams.

> [{quoted}](name=Cakemeisting,realm=OCE,application-id=FjGAIbRv,discussion-id=BszKicJZ,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2016-11-26T02:08:42.298+0000)
>
> Would be the simplest, yes. Do that and bring back ranked teams.

Best thing to do tbh, this Flex is only successful in high populated regions like NA an EUW/KR.
Also another thing is the que times are like 1 hour minimum out here LUL

I'm literally in the exact same predicament . ( However I'm getting the players in flex que instead of soloque )

Essentially I'm plat 3 solo/Duoq

I got placed in Gold 5 flex que , Climbed to gold 2 ( Prior to the "Potential fix ") , Now i'm stuck with bronze /silvers/and low golds vsing golds /plats /diamonds .

Quite frankly i feel as if this isn't fair , I'd like for my current flex que ranked to be completely reset so i can use the "potential fix " you guys have popping up every time i log into client as i haven't been included in that

I'll gladly redo my placement games , or your 11'th one that i never got ? because i climbed to 3 division before your "potential fix " was implemented. So when all the plats that didn't use the new que system got their average starting plat rank i was stuck with the bottom %

I understand where you're coming from , Oh look another player that thinks they belong somewhere if you're good climb bla bla bla ... if possible I'd greatly appreciate it if i can get my current flex rank reset so i can play my placements again . because by the looks of things if preseason comes ima be thrown in silver ?? Now from a developmental standpoint it
doesn't look right if a mid plat in solo/duo que is in gold/silver ?

Just had a rioter send me this from a ticket i put up ;
http://imgur.com/7bnZIYJ


Quite frankly they need to be fired or removed from their job because anyone who's actually played league for more then a year knows that ranked only soft resets and you'll be placed in a division 1-2 lower then where you're currently at .

"Focus on winning games " however is a punch in the throat however , is this person under the impression that I'm quing up to play ranked and spend 20-60 minutes of my life to lose or something ? Having BRONZE, SILVER ,GOLD players against Gold /Platinum /Diamonds is a fucking JOKE i mean sure if i was vsing people who where in the same elo bracket i'd be fine , but with matchups that i've been given the past 10 games it's near fucking impossible to climb it's literally luck at this point , Whoever gets the lower elo players tends to lose because at 40 minutes in they're gonna do something stupid to get caught and throw the game which annoys me even more because i've wasted nearly an HOUR just to lose due to one autistic person being qued into a game he/she shouldn't even be in.
Yea they need to merge it back together and bring back Dynamic Que for OCE as an exception.

Yeah , we simply don't have the population to accommodate this . Hell we don't even have 3v3 treeline yet.

What's the point of having 2 modes if we cant' even get balanced match making  Unranked /Bronze /silvers Shouldn't be vsing  golds /plats /diamonds It's fucking insane .

At this point it's literally 

League of Luck , whoever has the fewer low elos's wins . Feels bad when a  60% wr  / 3 kd turns to  56% wr >.< http://oce.op.gg/summoner/userName=Zedshot
I doubt they'll take any action tho :(
